Purring, stalking, pouncing, scratching.

Tail raised, back arched, eyes alert, whiskers forward.
Knocking things off the counter for sport.
Demanding food at 5am by sitting on your face.

Ignoring you completely until dinner time.
Bringing home a 'gift' from outside.
Zooming around the house at 3am.
Staring at the wall as if seeing ghosts.
Kneading the blanket like dough before lying down.
Slow blinking to show affection.
Sleeping for 16 hours a day.
Squeezing into impossibly small spaces.
Grooming obsessively for hours.
Chattering at birds through the window.
Completely ignoring the expensive toy, playing with the box instead.
Walking across your keyboard during an important meeting.
Sitting on exactly the thing you're trying to read.

Watching the bathtub fill with water from a safe distance.

Perching on the highest shelf in the house.
Knocking a glass of water off the nightstand.
Suddenly sprinting away from nothing.
Trilling when greeting you after a nap.
Curling into a perfect loaf shape.
Sticking my butt in your face as a sign of trust.

Batting at dangling strings with deadly precision.
Wedging myself behind the couch.

Climbing the Christmas tree.
Sitting in the bathroom sink.
Judging you silently from across the room.
Chewing on houseplants despite having food.
Making biscuits on your stomach.
Hiding when guests come over.
Emerging only when the house is quiet.
Drinking from the dripping faucet instead of the water bowl.
Wrapping myself around your ankles while you walk.
Hissing at the new furniture.
Finding the one sunny patch on the floor and claiming it.
Sharpening claws at 6am on the bedroom door.
Sprinting sideways with an arched back.
Investigating every paper bag thoroughly.
Sleeping in the laundry basket on clean clothes.
Yowling dramatically for no reason.
Gracefully knocking your phone off the table.
Sitting with my back to you when offended.
Stretching luxuriously after a long nap.
Hunting dust particles in the sunlight.
Refusing to be picked up, squirming free immediately.
Climbing onto the roof and pretending to be stuck.
Sitting on the warm laptop.
Pawing at your face at 4am because the food bowl is half empty.
Elegantly grooming one leg held straight up.
Making direct eye contact while pushing something off the edge.
Hiding in a closet for an entire day.
Chirping at moths near the porch light.
Sprawling across the entire bed.

Carefully inspecting and rejecting each piece of food.
Leaving hairballs in high-traffic areas.
Mrrping when startled awake.
Watching birds from the windowsill for hours.
Pretending not to hear when called.
Running from cucumbers.
Squinting contentedly while being scratched behind the ears.

Suddenly stopping grooming to stare into space.
Seeking out black clothing to shed on.
